title: The Return of Andrew Bentley (TV-1961) JOHN NEWLAND

sources.title: The Return of Andrew Bentley (TV-1961) JOHN NEWLAND
sources.description:
EXCLUSIVE Movie Class by PizzaFLIX Edition
Director: John Newland
Stars: John Newland, Antoinette Bower, and Boris Karloff (the one & only)
Teleplay by: Richard Matheson
An aging mystic will bequeath his fortune to his nephew on one condition: That he spends the night alone in the old man's gothic mansion. What seems like a simple request becomes a night of terror when his uncle's murdered rival rises from the grave!
CHAPTERS
0:00 Movie Class Introduction
2:52 Feature Synopsis
3:21 The Return of Andrew Bentley
